scripts.build:ui: rmdir /Q/S build && cd D:/TTY/full_stack_open/fullstack-open-asikainen/osa2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build --prod && xcopy D:\TTY\full_stack_open\fullstack-open-asikainen\osa2\puhelinluettelo\build D:\TTY\full_stack_open\part3-phonebook\build /E /I /Y
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
